author: The Associated Press
title: Trump's move to cut WHO funding prompts world condemnation
description: Nations around the world are reacting with alarm after U.S. President Donald Trump announced a halt to the sizable funding his country sends to the World Health Organization.
content: Nations around the world reacted with alarm Wednesday after President Donald Trump announced a halt to the sizable funding the United States sends to the World Health Organization. Health experts warned the move could jeopardize global efforts to stop the COV… [+5827 chars]
